scripts.build-task:scss-compile: node-sass --source-map true scss/ -o ../static/css --include-path scss/ && cp ./node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.min.js ../static/js/. && cp ./node_modules/popper.js/dist/umd/popper.min.js ../static/js/.
scripts.sass:watch: npm run build-task:scss-compile && node-sass scss/ -o ../static/css --include-path scss/ --watch --recursive
